title: How to Disable Images in Google Chrome

steps.title: Open Google Chrome on your computer.
steps.content: Open Google Chrome on your computer.

steps.title: Open settings.
steps.content: Open settings. You can get there from the three-dotted menu in the right hand corner of your browser, or by typing chrome://settings in the URL bar.

steps.title: Click Privacy and security.
steps.content: Click Privacy and security . This will be on the left panel.

steps.title: Click Images.
steps.content: Click Images . You may need to scroll down to find this.

steps.title: Click Don't allow sites to show images.
steps.content: Click Don't allow sites to show images . You'll no longer see images when browsing websites.
